title: my client wont update
body: it says  "update failed , unspecified error occured please check the logs for more information"  it gives an option to try again, and if i i do it repeats the error message in less than a second. i was just playing lastnight until like 1  am so i know its not my computer. i have allready  unistalled and reinstalled the launcher twice now im not really sure what else to do. and i also dont know what log they want me to check.  pls help!!! i would greatly apreciate it  : )

replies.body: Let us know in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you're still having this issue. Our devs seem to have been able to figure out what the main problem was, and I'm getting word that people have been able to log back in.
